backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining challenge, recording, chat, and user profile types with access control, storage mixins, build info, assignment metadata, and partially shown query methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, titles, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels for versioning and diagnostics features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of numerous frontend source files for quick reference.
frontend/.gitignore: Git ignore rules for dependencies, build outputs, environment files, IDE metadata, OS junk files, logs, testing artifacts, and caches.
frontend/index.css: Thin wrapper stylesheet re-exporting the main CSS from src/index.css.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting meta tags including cache-busting and app-version placeholder and loading the Vite main.tsx module.
frontend/scripts/generateAppVersion.mjs: Build script generating a unique version string, writing it to .env.local and a generated TypeScript module with runtime fallback logic.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component coordinating authentication, challenge state, URL-synced navigation, version stamping, update guard, and optional developer panel.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper providing centered mobile-style container and invoking the migration banner suppression hook.
frontend/src/components/AppUpdatingNotic: Full-screen notice shown during forced refresh when a version mismatch is detected.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentDetail: Renders multiline assignment text and bolds lines starting with step labels like “Step 1:”.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: Audio recording UI that handles recording, playback, errors, and upload flow with a share dialog.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication button that manages Internet Identity login/logout and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/AuthIconButton.t: Compact icon-based login/logout control using Internet Identity with loading states.
frontend/src/components/AutoInvitationRe: Gate component that auto-redeems invitation codes and manages loading, success, and error states.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeChatTab: Challenge chat interface supporting message send, edit, reply, live updates, and participant name resolution.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeDeleted: Dismissible alert dialog showing translated content when a challenge is deleted.
frontend/src/components/ChatReplyReferen: Displays a referenced message preview with sender name for chat replies, fetching data as needed.
frontend/src/components/DevPanel.tsx: Developer diagnostics panel showing auth info, version data, and debugging actions like cache refresh.
frontend/src/components/InfoPopups.tsx: Renders two info popups using SharedPopup, pulling localized text and section data from translation keys.
frontend/src/components/PopupBodySection: Displays a list of sections with optional headings and formatted paragraph content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCompletio: Blocks child content until the user profile has a name, showing a form to submit it if missing.
frontend/src/components/QueryStateGate.t: Wraps a react-query result to show loading, error, or child render based on query state.
frontend/src/components/RecordingLevelMe: Shows a colored audio level meter with percentage based on a normalized level value.
Audio player component with play/pause controls, seek slider, and time display for a given audio URL.
frontend/src/components/SharedPopup.tsx: Reusable dialog wrapper providing consistent layout, scroll behavior, and trigger handling.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button that toggles between light and dark themes using useTheme.
frontend/src/generated/appVersion.ts: Generates and exports a build version value using Vite env variables or a runtime fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUpdateGuard.ts: Checks for version mismatches on startup and triggers a one-time hard refresh if needed.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecording.ts: Provides audio recording state and controls with live level analysis, timers, and cleanup handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPrincipal.ts: Returns authentication state and principal data derived from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, loading stored identities, and exposing login state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, challenge data, recordings, and chat messages via an actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuppressMigrationB: Uses a MutationObserver to detect and hide a recurring migration banner in the DOM.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and toggling.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserChallengeStatu: Fetches the authenticated user’s challenge status using React Query and actor API.
frontend/src/i18n/i18n.ts: Empty file placeholder for i18n setup.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nContext.tsx: Implements a simple i18n provider exposing a translation function using predefined English translations.
frontend/src/i18n/index.ts: Empty index file for i18n exports.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Contains translation dictionaries for multiple languages, currently providing full English text for the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles configuring color variables, dark mode, and component styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point mounting the app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
Empty placeholder component file for Screen 1.
UI placeholder for screen 3 showing no active challenge, recovery actions, and navigation to challenge creation.
Placeholder for challenge creation and management with date setup, invitation codes, participant controls, and challenge lifecycle actions.
Simple placeholder showing challenge state info with optional edit navigation and info popups.
Main in-challenge screen handling day navigation, recordings, chat, participant data, and URL state syncing.
frontend/src/screens/UnifiedEntryMenu.ts: Entry screen determining login or challenge actions based on user status, with theme/auth controls and info popups.
frontend/src/utils/appUrlState.ts: Utilities for reading, writing, and clearing navigation state stored in URL query parameters.
frontend/src/utils/appVersion.ts: Helpers for reading, validating, extracting, and stamping app version metadata with fallback handling for placeholders.
frontend/src/utils/assignments.ts: Defines the fixed 5 daily assignments for the 7‑day challenge with canonical IDs, titles, and content.
frontend/src/utils/backendBuildInfo.ts: Caches backend build info in memory and provides helper accessors and a short identifier string.
frontend/src/utils/challengeContext.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears the active challenge ID in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDayFormat.ts: Formats a challenge day header using start time and day index, falling back gracefully on errors.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDeletedNotic: Manages a sessionStorage flag indicating whether a challenge‑deleted notice should be shown.
frontend/src/utils/challengeRecovery.ts: Resets all client challenge state by clearing storage, URL state, and invalidating related React Query caches.
frontend/src/utils/hardRefresh.ts: Performs a cache‑busted hard refresh with loop protection and exposes helpers to trigger or clear it.
frontend/src/utils/invitationCodes.ts: Generates random uppercase invitation codes using a non‑ambiguous character set.
frontend/src/utils/invitationLinks.ts: Builds, parses, persists, and clears invitation URL parameters and sessionStorage‑stored invitation data.
frontend/src/utils/recordingDayIndex.ts: Converts between UI (1–7) and backend (0–6) day indices with validation helpers.
Logs recording upload attempts, failures, and successes with minimal sanitized metadata for debugging.
frontend/src/utils/recordingIds.ts: Defines canonical assignment IDs, validates them, and provides normalization and assertion utilities for recording operations.
Provides helpers to extract and classify error messages and map them to safe, user‑friendly strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/versionCheck.ts: Fetches the latest HTML to compare build versions and determine if a refresh is needed, with a legacy wrapper for compatibility.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and layout settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing build-version issues, existing features, and requirements for fixing stale frontend asset problems.
